titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide that employees appointed under chapters 73 and 74 of that title have protection against certain prohibited personnel practices.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S9740-9741)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 7/26/1994--Introduced. Applies specified Federal provisions concerning protection of Federal employees from certain prohibited personnel practices (whistleblower provisions) to Department of Veterans Affairs medical personnel. Authorizes the Merit Systems Protection Board and the Office of Special Counsel to review and investigate such prohibited personnel actions.
